Bugs in Shoes

2004-01-20


Bugs in Shoes - "Going on about something"
Slap-Happy Comix - Series 001 Episode 001
forresto will be my new cartoonist alterego.
Hmm... I've kinda had the idea of making a comic in the past, but trying to force that kind of thing outta myself always ends in disappointment. It has to just come and ask to be let out. So maybe this will be the only one... Series 001 Episode 001.

« In the praqaayer bulletin... I haven't quit the whole cartoonist idea yet! »
